author: Damian Clarkson
comment: Great app. Previously used radiotuner but too many issues. This is way better. Is stable and runs fine in background connected to car. 1 thing... Please add feature to stop the app audio automatically if i disconnect bluetooth ie in car Also i have upgraded to pro but the icon and name havent updated

author: Glenn Laycock
comment: Low ONE TIME cost.  It is NOT a music service, just streams many (all I have found) stations.  Get the NO AD version .. as the ads are "bug like" it seems to me.  No ad version work wonderful and you get get controls to SHUT IT of etc - which is so trick with most (they just pause).  Recommend.

author: david smeaton
comment: Ive been using this app for a long time with great result. This ap is strait up, always works very well and no ad hassles. Ad hassles is why I left the last one I used. It's a big name, won't say here. Enjoy your music.

author: Yannan Cai
comment: Loving this app. I used to listen to101.7 on their website but the song always stopped playing every now and then which was annoying. Thx so much for this app.  Works wonderfully. The sound quality is great, easy to use, and has a pretty layout. Definitely recommended.

author: T. de Blanken
comment: Support Chrome cast👍 only if play YouTube or ads on Chrome this app stops directly.... Edit; so if the app plays to Chrome cast and Chrome web browser opens a web page with ads player stops and Chrome cast says noting to play. Same issue if I want play YouTube on my phone or just a other app. Also Huawei phone manager notifi that this is a power intansive app. It's Huawei p10 lite on 7.0

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thank you for your feedback!
If there are 2 audio sources, only 1 of them can continue playing, until one of them stops.
best,
Support Team

author: Darren Greenidge
comment: I have had this app for a long time now on my laptop and phone but recently it will not connect to the latter and is not an Internet connection problem. It seems to no longer connect on Bluetooth devices even though it says it's playing, so may need to get rid of it from my phone now if no solution? Very frustrating. Tried it on four different Bluetooth devices now. It was fine a around two months ago.

author: Luis Fabian
comment: Easy to use app. Great assortment of stations. You can even suggest stations to be added. The only problem that I'm running is that audio controls on the lock screen and always-on screen on the Samsung Galaxy S8 don't work anymore.

author: Daniel Yong
comment: There are times when the app drops off memory or stops playing, requiring a manual stop and start button press. But otherwise quite satisfactory in the range of stations.

author: Gianluca Veneziano
comment: Great choice of stations.  Occasionally drops out and needs to be re-loaded. Pop-up ads are annoying. All in all great app, set up your chosen station and the music is all sorted for you 😁

author: Francois Cousineau
comment: I downloaded to listen to any radio station I wanted across the country and it does that. However the feed is a little delayed so can't use it for radio contests.

author: Jorge Jimenez
comment: It's great no static and finding stations for all over without static or an antenna of some kind. A bit hard to find some stations that I listen to can't just put the numbers in and boom got it you do have to listen and know the name of a station to find it or click through a few to find your stations that is the only downside. I would give it a 4 & 1/2 stars not five for that but they don't do half a star.

author: frazicl
comment: I may be digging 2.99 out of my pocket for this! This is icing on the cake, but sure would like to set an alert alarm for a scheduled show, from within the app. Great work!

author: wara waiyoo
comment: This is the best app I downloaded ever... Just wondering if you have equalizer supported... But anyway, thanks...you have a good job... Can't wait for you to make this app getting better and better and better....!

author: sue porter
comment: After the last update it now regularly freezes,  I don't like having to fiddle with it to get it to work and I woke up at 1 in the morning because it had switched on, please fix these issues

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
We are aware of this problem and we are working to correct it as soon as possible.
We advise you to disable the notifications of the app so as not to disturb you until we solve the problem.
Best,
Support team

author: Tim Larsen
comment: I would only give it 4,5 stars but could not and all weighs more to 5 stars , it have 2 small issues though , that is , it works only in portrait mode ,which is alittle annoying therefor i use my tablet in my workshed mainly in landscape mode and second it only works on a few channels on my bluetooth speaker (JBL micro) but beside that in general a super super app. so i hope a update with landscape mode would be considered .... best regards Tim

author: Mitch Dickson
comment: This is everything that they said it was. Haven't been disappointed and have only found 2 stations not carried. Ads were a real pain at 1st but upgrade was cheap & well worth the $2.99 to not have those ads.

author: Leander Pearson
comment: Great Internet radio app. Even seems to adjust to lower bandwidth by streaming automatically lower bit rate streams. Good buffering and seamless transition from WiFi to cell data and back. Worth the upgrade price to dump the adds.

author: Brandon Van
comment: Issue seems to be fixed. Not sure what the issue was but today it will actually play on the Chromecast again. Doesn't just sit on the screen trying to load. Thanks for the reply 5 star rated!

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
We have tested and chromecast function is working without any problem.
Please send us an email with all the details about your problem so we can analyze this situation better. - help@mytuner.mobi
Best,
Support team

author: Ben Treece
comment: This happens great it does not drop out like other radio apps do good job guys but there's one thing that I would make a suggestion for improvement like to be able to have it to rotate whenever I rotate my phone and more on screen widgets!

author: Scott Gaunt
comment: I like my "myTuner FM Radio - Online Radio / Free radio stations: FM Radio & AM Radio"  because I can listen to 90.1 WFYI FM and WFYI in HD1 Indianapolis, Cymocast In Cooperation with Indiana State University & Franklin & Wabash Colleges on WISU FM & WISU in HD1 Franklin & 91.3 WNDY FM and WNDY in HD1 Crawfordsville and Soft Rock B105.7 WYXB-FM and WYXB in HD1 Indianapolis!  Thanks "Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM & FM Music, News" team for make-in my  "myTuner FM Radio - Online Radio / Free radio stations: FM Radio & AM Radio" app possible by make-in sure my "myTuner FM Radio - Online Radio / Free radio stations: FM Radio & AM Radio" app opens up & runs smoothly without any force close-in! You Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and FM Music, News team deserve 5 stars (*****)! Thanks again "Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM & FM Music, News team" for make-in my "myTuner FM Radio - Online Radio / Free radio stations: FM Radio & AM Radio" app possible! Keep up the excellent work "Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM & FM Music, News" team! Best Regards, Name: Scott Andrew Jacob  Gaunt Monday 11/14/2016 8:15 A.M. in the mornin'! Comment Posted To Google Play Store By  Use-in: Windows® 7© Professional®©
Ads mingled among stations. That is  NOT going to happen, not on my phone - uninstalled.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
In order to make our app available for free we must have ads, however we have an in-app version for those who do not want to have ads.
Cheers,
Support team

author: Dang Bubendorff
comment: The radio is sometime intermittent...  It will pkay dor a few min, then stops for 5-15 sec, and start again...  Especially when im listening to 98.5FM

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Please have in mind that the app requires a good internet connection in order to work/connect.
Does this happen with one station or several? Please edit your review or send us some feedback about the name and frequency of the stations that this happens. - help@mytuner.mobi so we can help.
Best,
myTuner Team

author: Le'wa Shrshr
comment: I've been bouncing around a few apps, just trying to listen to Soma FM, and this is by far the best radio app for it. No real issues compared to others.
Please have an 'info' button to read full title and description of podcast/ radio before listening. At the moment not possible before/ while listening

author: Mike Nelson
comment: I Find MOST Of My Favorite formats in One App ,  ESPECIALLY During The  CHRISTMAS Season !!   👍 👍,  But I Would like sports NOT Being off  Air WHILE Their being Played !

author: Jay Sathi
comment: Worked great when I purchased the app but after the latest software update, it keeps playing the Radio station even after  turning off the Bluetooth device.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thank you for using our app and for taking the time to write your comment.
The best way to close our app is from the notifications bar that is always at the top of the screen.
Yours,
The Support Team

author: Somnath Das
comment: Great radio app. This is the best UI of a radio app which offers you thousands of online radio stations. Sound quality is also superb. It allows us to filer by various options like genre, country or region etc. Great job developers _/\_

Started off good as a one stop shop with the most stations all in one app, but now the URL links are on a fast decline breaking left and right one after the other.  They don't seem to maintain their service.  Audio streams have been dropping like flies in just a matter of weeks.  I'm now back with Tunein and iHeart

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thank you for your feedback!
May we kindly ask you to give us some more insight about this? Feel free to edit your review or send us an email about it to - help@mytuner.mobi so we can help.
We perform several tests on our applications and a regular phone operates normally for 24 hours.
Best,
Support Team

author: The Hungry Sage
comment: Updated rating. Contacted support about Bluetooth issues and told them what all I had tried and they told me to try things I had already mentioned I did in the email. Specified what stations I listened to that did not play at all or was having BT troubles on, they said updated link would be out soon and I waited for that update and still the same problems. BT does not work on most stations and the one local station does not play at all. No since buying full version if they won't fix the free ones problems.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
We need more information about your issue and the stations that this happens.
Please send us again an email to info@appgeneration.com with all the details.
We will analyze your situation asap.
Best,
Support team

author: Tony Rogers
comment: Kinda works, but buggy. Doesn't stop or close properly (restarts and plays at random, task killer doesn't stop it). 3 ads repeated over and over gets annoying.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
In order to make our app available for free we must have ads, however we have an in-app version for those who do not want to have ads.
If there is a failure or change in the network the app will switch to a next station when the connection is established again.
Cheers,
Support team

author: Shawn X
comment: It's a decent app. But, there are too many ads, and it crashes too often.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
In order to make our app available for free we must have ads, however we have an in-app version for those who do not want to have ads.
Cheers,
Support team

author: Laura Elizondo
comment: I love this app my phone doesn't have an fm radio in it so when I want to hear just the radio not the same songs I bought over and over I can turn this app and listen to my favorite stations plus more so I love it.

author: Michelle Mitchell
comment: Hi.  Why can't I minimise the app & keep listening whilst I do other things on my phone. The ABC lets you do this so why can't you ? It is very frustrating that you can't  do anything else on your phone when you have this app running. I am on 4G on Samsung android.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
Our app works fine on background mode.Please make sure you're not using a memory saving app / task killer app in the background (sometimes the manufacture of the phone add them to save power and don't allow apps to perform in background mode).
Best,
myTuner Team

author: Michael ARBET
comment: Hello, I have two notes how to improve this app. 1. I was observing network traffic when listening through Chromecast and found that data stream goes from internet radio station to the mobile and then to the Chromecast. In the other side, acorns app (TuneIn) just directed Chromecast to receive the stream from its source. This is besides better for battery life. But I don't like TuneIn. 2. There used to be nice feature that was showing not only current song but also their history. Instead of this I see list of suggested radio stations and they absolutely don't interest me. Please please bring the song history back at least as an option.  Thanks. -Michael-  Ps: I almost paid your app and will surely do it you fix it.

I paid to remove ads but it didn't change to pro, which it looks like I can purchase for less than removing ads in the free version??   Stupid app keeps asking me to rate it too. Why can't I just listen with simplicity? I already paid for it...

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
The mytuner free app version has an in app which allows you to remove the ads. The pop-ups and interstitials ads.
The Mytuner pro version have some features and come already without ads.
These are two isolated apps.
If you are dissatisfied with any purchases made, please send us an email to help@mytuner.mobi
Best,
Support team

author: Oriana Perez
comment: Sometimes it stops playing for no reason. For the most part it works well. Good quality audio.

author: Lobert Cruz
comment: I DONT LIKE MOST DATA EATER ANG LAG IN 2GB RAM ANNOYING AD AND NOT CLEAR RADIO SIGNAL EVEN IN WI FI😭

author: Sean DaCosta
comment: Doesn't respond when play/pause pressed on Bluetooth headphones. EQ doesn't work (wired and wireless connection). I have the Pro version but the app icon still showing it as free version.

author: Angel&Michael Hibbard
comment: Lost all my music on my phone and at night I do janitorial work, and having it quiet is no fun, for having fun music at my finger tips with local radio channels in my area its great, they actually match what is playing on the radio!

author: Tracy P
comment: Haven't used many music apps but this one is ok. Seems to be lots of interruptions in the music but not the ads. Boo, but I'm using the free service
